project.name: Determinism
project.notes: The goal of this project is to explore non-determinism; what if four sprites tried to fill the screen with their color?

scripts.comment: Important!! Do not click on the block above. Instead, click the green flag. Otherwise, you're only running this sprite (and not the blue/gold/white ones).

block-definition.s: adjoin to %'list' this item %'new' on the right
make all combinations of items of %'lists' combining with %'combiner' building up from %'sofar' and do %'action' for each combination

custom-block.s: make all combinations of items of %mult%l combining with %repRing building up from %s and do %cs for each combination

scripts.comment: Note to staff: Warping the contents of this for block prevents preemption of this thread.
